name: Morrowgrain to Feathermoon Stronghold
tooltip:
Morrowgrain to Feathermoon Stronghold

Hello again, <name>.  My research is progressing fairly well, but if you have five more Morrowgrain I'd be happy to take them off your hands.  Well... happy is a figurative term in this case; the more I am around them, the more uncomfortable I feel.  Still, my research demands I buckle down and get through this.

Requirements:
- Morrowgrain x 5
